query: SELECT id, name, slug, overview, CHAR_LENGTH(topThingsToDo) as activities_length FROM island_guides WHERE slug = 'kendhoo' OR name = 'Kendhoo'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT id, name, slug, overview, CHAR_LENGTH(topThingsToDo) as activities_length FROM island_guides WHERE slug = 'kendhoo' OR name = 'Kendhoo'
